#summary Redcap requirement and features list

= RedCap requirements=


= Features list=
  # Exhaustive chat command set with more than 30 different commands (See [RedCap_User_guide full command list]). Command use is recorded in a separate log file for further use.
  # Fully customizable configuration (See [RedCap_config_file full configuration guide])
  # Anticheat control: !RedCap kicks for bad guid, in game guid change, nick rotation hack. Nick IP and GUID are recorded in a separate log file for further use.
  # Automatic (or manual) team balance.
  # Anti flooding control (fully customizable).
  # Automatic daily maintenance (DB clean, gameserver restart, files backup, etc...)
  # Irregular nickname (customizable through a [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Regular_expression regexp])
  # Bad words censoring (customizable through a [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Regular_expression regexp] list)
  # Player skill calculation system based on statistic kill expectancy, opponent skill and opposite team mean skill.
  # General player stats showing skill, killstreak, hit distribution and more...
  # IP recording in stats.
  # Player alias recording in stats.
  # Player temporary ban and enforced ban by IP and GUID
  # Acces control to gameserver based on player reliability (customizable)
  # Anti reconnection system
  # One command switch to and from CW mode with possibility to load different configuration files.
  # Possibility to manage (create, delete, list) spam messages directly from game chat.
